uncertain of what your next step should be, contact us and we can walk you
through it.

> # Expert Personal Injury Attorney Law Firm in the Wausau Area

The Maeder Law firm has been running a successful law firm from the same
Wausau location for over 50 years, our lawyers have handled thousands of
cases. We know what it takes to get full value for your injuries. The
insurance companies know we come prepared and won’t agree to a lowball
settlement.

SCHEDULE YOUR FREE CONSULTATION

# lawyers for the injured

#### Practice Areas

Our law firm will fight to get you and your family the maximum compensation
possible.

Learn More >>

#### Why Use us?

We’re experienced with all types of injury cases and aren’t intimidated by
anyone.

Learn More >>

#### Hire the right lawyer

If you don’t win we don’t get paid.

Learn More >>

## Get the legal help you deserve

### from a top ranked attorney

#### Have you been involved in an accident or suffering because of the
negligence or careless actions of someone else?

The experienced and highly acclaimed Wisconsin personal injury attorneys at
Jerome A. Maeder S.C. law firm will address your legal needs as they would for
their own family — with the passion and dedication it takes to help rebuild
your life.

When you’ve suffered a life-changing accident or injury, you need an accident
attorney who will aggressively push for the justice you deserve. You deserve
the justice of a complete and full-financial recovery for your injuries and we
will make every effort to provide the high-quality legal counsel that you
need. You and your legal case will be handled with compassion, attention, and
urgency. We will get to know you and your story, and treat you like family.
You are not passed over to some paralegal representative like most mega-office
law firms. Instead, our attorneys work directly with you personally; handling
your case personally.

Don’t settle for less. Get the experienced and highly acclaimed personal
injury attorneys from Jerome A. Maeder S.C. working on your behalf. To
schedule an appointment to discuss your accident or injury, call us today.
The initial consultation is free.

Call 715-842-2281

# Our lawyers are commited to you

There are three basic commitments for how we serve our clients

## 1

#### Protection

It is our mission to protect you and your loved one’s legal rights.

## 2

#### Commitment

We are committed to keeping you informed about the progress and status of your
case.

## 3

#### Dedication

We work solely on a contingent fee basis, and we only get paid when we recover
money on your behalf. If we do not recover a settlement or successful verdict
for you, you owe us nothing.

# OUR FEATURED LEGAL SERVICES

**Learn More >>**

## Truck Accidents

The Maeder Legal Team has handled hundreds of truck accidents over the years
in many different states.

## Car Accidents

Car accident damages can have a much greater impact on your life than just the
damage done to the vehicle, especially if the insurance company finds you to
be at fault. Get the firepower of our legal team on your side.

## worker's compensation

Work injuries have a major impact on our lives and the ability to provide for
our families. This area of the law is confusing and the insurance company is
not going to look out for your best interest. Lost wages, medical expenses,
and worries over the future are difficult problems that you do not want to
face alone. We have successfully handled thousands of work injury claims and
we are ready to help you.

## dog bites

Wisconsin’s law of ‘strict liability’ for dog bites is not as straightforward
as it seems. It burdens the responisibility of ‘contributotry negligence’ on
the injured person.

## Slip, Trip, or Fall Down Accidents

Slip, trip, and fall down accidents are some of the most difficult cases to
handle. The insurance company will blame you for the accident. Many law firms
refuse to handle these difficult cases. The Maeder Legal Team routinely
handles these cases and we are successful in recovering for our clients.

## Motorcycle Accidents

We are riders and we know the risks. At the Firm we have a saying “Motorcycle
riders should have equal rights on the highway, the Maeder Legal Team makes
sure they have equal rights in the courtroom.”

## Other Negligent Claims

These claims are all based on poor design or defective manufacturing. We hold
the manufacturers, distributors, and dealers of these products responsible for
any damages they may have caused.

## Shaping Wisconsin Law

One way to objectively measure a law firm’s actual trial experience is to
check the number of appellate decisions it has been involved in over the
years.

## Construction Site Accidents

Injuries that occur on construction sites are often complex and can involve
numerous contractors, who may all bear a share of the blame. Our firm has
successfully handled many local construction site accident cases.

## Farm Accidents

Farming is a way of life in Wisconsin. Each year there are numerous hard-
working people who are significantly injured and even killed in farming
accidents. We will help get you the compensation you are entitled to from
injuries caused by a farm accident.

## Boating Accidents

We all love spending time on the water, but this activity can also be
dangerous if boaters do not follow safety guidelines. We know the laws
governing water-related recreational activities and we will make sure you get
fully compensated for your claim.

## Snowmobile/ATV Accidents

Some of the same rules of the road that apply to motor vehicles also apply to
the use of these trails. Injuries can occur when the rules are not followed.
If you are injured in such an accident, you are entitled to compensation.

## Brain Injuries

The devastating impact of head injuries have made headlines in recent years.
However, it is not just those in athletics or the military who are affected,
but anybody who has sustained head trauma can have tremendous life-altering
consequences. Contact our office to be sure that you are compensated.

## Products Liability

Every year many people are severely injured due to dangerous and defective
products. The Maeder Legal Team has successfully pursued the manufacturers of
products that cause injuries.

## Social Security Disability

The Maeder Legal Team will navigate the process and obtain the evidence
necessary to effectively represent you in front of the Social Security
Administration.

## Spinal Injuries

Injuries to your neck and back can be devastating, both in the need for
extensive and costly treatment and also to your ability to work. The Maeder
Legal Team is experienced in handling these complex spinal injury cases and in
protecting you and your family.

## Wrongful Death

Many lives are needlessly lost each year as the result of accidents that occur
in our workplaces, recreation areas, and on our highways. The Maeder Legal
Team will hold the responsible parties accountable and get you the
compensation you deserve in this time of grief and loss.

# What our clients have to say

“When my 8-year-old daughter and I were injured in a car accident, we called
the Maeder Law Firm right away. They treated us like family and took away the
stress of dealing with the insurance company. The Maeder legal team delivered
on their promise to protect our family.” - Lacie

“As a lifetime farmer, I feared I was about to lose everything as a result of
the severities of the accident. Brad Myska of the Maeder Law firm told me
‘worry about getting better’ he would take care of the legal details. The
Maeder legal team delivered on their promise. They are the lawyers for the
injured.” - Ronald

“Shortly after losing both of my parents, I was involved in a terrible car
accident - one that left me seriously injured and in desperate need of help.
Brad Myska of the Maeder law firm stepped in and he took care of me. The
Maeder legal team got me every penny I was entitled to and they treated me
like a member of their own family when I needed someone to lean on the most.”
- Jacob

“I fought for my country in Vietnam. When I was injured in a car accident, I
needed someone who would fight for me. The Maeder Law firm never quit
fighting. They didn’t leave a dime on the table. They’re like the guys in my
squad, they covered my back.” - Tom

“I was seriously injured in an accident. Because the dump truck blew the tire
before the collision, the adjuster said he wouldn’t give me a dime. I hired
the Maeder Team. Brad Myska proved that the dump truck driver was at fault,
and I recovered big time. He had my back all the way.” - James

“I had a terrible injury from an auto accident. Everybody said it was my
fault, but Brad Myska tried my case, the jury believed me. Brad Myska helped
me when no one else would.” - Jean

“I suffered a severe work injury which required surgery and my partner was in
a horrible car accident and lost her job because of the injuries. We hired the
Maeder Law firm and attorney Ben Welch stood up for our family when we needed
it the most.” - Larry

“As a member of the US military, I command hard work, respect, and integrity
from myself. Brad Myska with the Maeder legal team, delivered in handling my
personal injury case. The Maeder legal team is top-notch. Hire Maeder Law firm
for top results.” - David

“My prior attorney suggested to me that the accident was my fault. I was hit
as a pedestrian in the school parking lot and it was on surveillance. I then
hired Brad Myska and the Maeder law firm. He completely stood up for me,
making sure the insurance company paid in full.” - Natasha

“I was badly injured in an auto accident and two law firms told me I had no
case. I hired the Maeder law firm and they sued the insurance company, I
received a large settlement. My advice is to get Bradly Myska. He will fight
and you will win.” - Sherri

## No Cost Pledge

Our "no cost guarantee" means that you can hire the best and recover the
maximum amount that the law will allow. If you are not satisfied with your
current representation, it is easier to change lawyers than you think. Give us
a call and get an immediate response.
